N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 §§ 82-1.8 - Selection of panel member by employee

State Regulations

Where an employee has exercised the option to have the
hearing conducted before a hearing panel, within five days after receiving the
copy of the notification to the commissioner of the need for a panel hearing, the employee shall, in writing by certified mail, notify the board and the
commissioner of the name of his or her selection for the hearing panel. If the
employee shall fail to notify the commissioner and the board as required and
the employee has not waived his or her right to a hearing, the commissioner
shall select the employee panel member for the employee. Notes
